name: Puzzle Champions
summary:
Solve the puzzles to obtain treasure and even save the princess from Goblins!

If you are trying to locate the actual game where you solve puzzles with lava, water, dangerous enemies, etc. then look no further! That is EXACTLY the gameplay you get with this game - nothing more; nothing less. Puzzle Champions puts you in control of helping our young hero work their way through various puzzle challenges in order to obtain treasures and save his love from certain death!
